item.title: Today I Learned about New Security Tools, Static Code Analyzers, and Self-Hosted Service Options
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Cybersecurity Tools" , "Static Code Analysis" , "Privacy and Security" , "Self-Hosted Services" , "GitHub Resources" , "Security Recommendations" , "Code Quality Assurance" , "Personal Security" , "Home Lab Setup" , "Privacy-Respecting Services"
item.description: What SimeonOnSecurity learned about and found interesting today SimeonOnSecurity is a person who has a keen interest in security and privacy and has come across several resources today that they found interesting and would like to share with others. One of the resources that caught their attention is the “Awesome Security” list on GitHub. This list contains an extensive collection of awesome security tools and SimeonOnSecurity plans to continue exploring and learning about the items on this list.
